description.full: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) This game supports English only. Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual". From the core founding members of the MX vs ATV franchise comes the ultimate off-road racing experience, BAJA: Edge of Control. Build the ultimate off-road vehicle and conquer the toughest terrain Mother Nature has to offer in the most realistic off-road racing game ever created. Combining the best elements of the real-world sport with the right balance of arcade fun, BAJA: Edge of Control transports players to the epic open worlds and unforgiving terrain found at the pinnacle of off-road racing. Stunning visuals, vertical environments, and unpredictable terrain are crossed in over 100 square miles of drive-to-horizon landscape. Master hill-climb, circuit, and rally races to earn career sponsorships on the path to off-road supremacy. Harness the horsepower of elite Trophy Trucks, 4x4’s and Buggies to finally compete in the definitive off-road endurance challenge, the Baja 1000. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
